course.title: PSY 4302 Laboratory in Physiological Psychology (3 units)
course.desc: Lectures on research methods in behavioural neurobiology. Series of experiments in this field. The laboratories may include brain surgery, intracranial stimulation, behavioural pharmacology and neurophysiology. Current research in laboratory in physiological psychology.Course Component: Laboratory, LecturePrerequisite: 81 university units including PSY 1101, PSY 1102, PSY 2301, PSY 3301. Reserved for students registered in the Honours programs in psychology.
